doc.repnme: Peru - Estudio cualitativo sobre lavado de manos : Resumen ejecutivo
doc.abstracts: This report presents a qualitative study on handwashing among children in Peru. The objective of the study is to provide in-depth information for the design of a communication program which will reinforce or change the habits of children, in order to augment the habit of handwashing with soap at the most important times (after using the bathroom, and before eating, especially), and so that they themselves will be agents of change regarding handwashing habits in their nuclear families. Section 1 outlines the objectives of the study in more detail. Section 2 lays out the methodology used. Section 3 analyzes the information obtained, which has been structured around a series of themes that are addressed in the analysis of the family, the child's world, the perception of cleanliness and handwashing, finishing with an analysis of what happens in the schools.
